message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,000,000. I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations and deliver significant returns.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this price is more reasonable considering the value you mentioned.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is firmly above that price point. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,850,000. I believe this reflects the true worth and potential this product holds.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand your perspective on the product's value, but I'm still hesitant to go above $1,400,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've highlighted.
